CareerCard - Class in phase1
implements a Career Card that has the name of the career, the maximum pay raise, and a boolean type which determines whether the career needs a degree or not.

E

G

Game - Class in phase1
Creates a game that initalizes all decks and adds players to the game.
Game(int) - Constructor for class phase1.Game
Implements a game object that has the number of players as a parameter.
gameOver() - Method in class phase1.Game
Checks if the game is over when all the players are retired.
generateDeck() - Method in class phase1.Deck
generates a deck of action cards which has a composition of 40% (Collect from Bank) Cards, 40% (Pay Bank) Cards, 10% (Pay Player), and 10% (Collect from Player) of the total number (max) of cards specified.

phase1 - package phase1
 
Player - Class in phase1
Implements a Player that has a name, their current cash, the latest ActionCard drawn from the deck, a boolean value which determines if he is retired, and a CareerCard which consist of the details of his career
